member.name: M:JamSoft.Helpers.Patterns.Mvvm.SuperObservableCollection`1.OnCollectionChanged(System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: The on collection changed handler.

members.member:
Adds the provided collection of and suppresses collection changed events until all objects have been added, then optionally fires one event.
Once all objects have been added a single is created and the OnCollectionChanged event is fired
The collection of object to add A flag to suppress change notifications///

member.summary: Sorts the collection using the default comparer

member.summary: A utility class for dirty monitoring

member.name: M:JamSoft.Helpers.Ui.IsDirtyValidator.Validate``1(``0,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Validates properties and fields decorated with on whole instances for dirtiness. If any monitored value has changed, the IsDirty property will be set to True
member.remarks: Validate the clean object in order to calculate the clean hash value for the object instance. Subsequent calls will detect if the contents has changes between validations

member.name: M:JamSoft.Helpers.Ui.IsDirtyValidator.ValidatePropertiesAndFields``1(``0)
member.summary: Checks individual values within properties and fields and returns a list of each with changes
member.remarks: For a call to this method to work, the object must have been previously validated with by calling the Validate method with trackProperties set to true
member.returns: Two arrays, one of objects and one of objects

member.name: M:JamSoft.Helpers.Ui.IsDirtyValidator.GetObjectHash``1(``0,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the object hash from the objects property values.
member.returns: An MD5 hash representing the object

member.summary: Gets the MD5 sum from the buffer byte data.
